It is not known how the lack of XK protein leads to the movement problems and other features of McLeod neuroacanthocytosis syndrome.",GHR,McLeod neuroacanthocytosis syndrome
Is McLeod neuroacanthocytosis syndrome inherited ?,"McLeod neuroacanthocytosis syndrome is inherited in an X-linked recessive pattern. The gene associated with this condition is located on the X chr
